item.title: If these headphones are real, Apple actually could be massively changing the iPhone
item.description: Anyone keeping up to date on their iPhone rumors will know there's a possibility of the headphone jack disappearing on the iPhone 7 - and these leaked headphones have just added weight to that theory.

item.title: What? The Pokémon series is evolving!
item.description:
Pokémon Go is a free-to-play Pokémon-capture game coming to iOS and Android this year, and follows on from Niantic's previous work with Ingress in that Pokémon will be region-specific in the real world, forcing players to travel far afield to catch 'em all.
Players will also be able to purchase the Pokémon Go Plus, a Bluetooth device used to help players identify capture locations at any time.

item.title: Apple teams up with Cookie Monster to sell you on hands-free Siri
item.description: Today, Apple is airing a new iPhone commercial that similarly taps into Cookie Monster’s enduring appeal to promote the hands-free Siri functionality of the iPhone. In a spot that is very reminiscent of the kids cooking shows my daughter devours on YouTube (that can’t be an accident), Cookie Monster uses Siri to help him bake some cookies, and helps him pass the time doing his least-favorite thing: waiting.
